contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 22, 1998 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Fourth Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-contest-fourth-section
Entertainments Contest
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - Eb Bass Briton Ferry. Prizes - 1st £150, 2nd £90, 3rd £60. 8 bands competed.
April 30, 2015, 3:57 p.m. July 2, 2020, 2:22 p.m.
1 Raunds Temperance Band John Fletcher
2 Cross Keys Silver Band Kerry Bowden
3 Blaenavon Town Band Bryn Davies
4 Vale of Glamorgan Band Ivor Barnett
5 Briton Ferry Band Jeffrey Pearce
6 Abertillery & District Youth Eric Powell
7 Lady Windsor Band T. W. Morgan
8 Severn Tunnel Band Adrian Browning
